item.title: map(expr) + renderUI -> dynamic shiny
item.description: I wrote my first shiny widget. A shiny widget is an html widget which uses shiny functions. In form it resembles a shiny app very closely, only the shinyApp function is wrapped in another function, which can take whatever arguments you like. More background can be found here. In order for the shiny widget to run, it needs a shiny runtime behind the document, which means it needs a server, just like a shiny app.
